009package HoughTransform;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.hough.HoughTransformLines;
017import imagingbook.common.hough.HoughTransformLines.Parameters;
018import imagingbook.common.hough.lines.HoughLine;
019
020/** 
021 * This plugin implements a simple Hough transform for straight lines.
022 * It expects a binary (8-bit) image, with background = 0 and foreground (contour) 
023 * pixels with values &gt; 0.
024 * Output of results is text-only.
025 * 
026 * @author WB
027 * @version 2022/04/01
028 */
029public class Hough_Lines_Minimal implements PlugInFilter {
030
031        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
032                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
033        }
034
035        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
036                
037                Parameters params = new Parameters();
038                params.nAng = 256;              // = m
039                params.nRad = 256;              // = n
040
041                // compute the Hough Transform:
042                HoughTransformLines ht = new HoughTransformLines((ByteProcessor)ip, params);
043                
044                // retrieve the 5 strongest lines with min. 50 points
045                HoughLine[] lines = ht.getLines(50, 5);
046                
047                if (lines.length > 0) {
048                        IJ.log("Lines found:");
049                        for (HoughLine L : lines) {
050                                IJ.log(L.toString());   // list the resulting lines
051                        }
052                } 
053                else 
054                        IJ.log("No lines found!");
055        }
056
057}
058
059
